La Thuile is situated in the Alps at the extreme north-west of the country, close to the French alpine town of
. La Thuile is situated along a road going from
in the north-west up to the Little St Bernard Pass in the south-east linking Italy to
and the Isère Valley in France.
Public transportation includes regular buses connecting La Thuile to Pré-Saint-Didier, the latter has a railway station connected to the Italian railway network via Aosta.

content=Le Miramonti Welleness Hotel is surrounded by the natural elements of water and mountain, right next to downtown and less than 400 meters from the ski slopes. The resort is an architectural rebirth of an historical hotel dated 1887. Inside the local natural stone walls, the impressive wood walls, hand-made furniture and the stone fire place maintain the unique ambience and atmosphere of a traditional luxury mountain chalet.
